name: Pokémon Rocket Edition: Evil Ash
description:
• This rom hack is made by me Gbt773, It took quite not that long I had to keep exporting images from pokemon ash gray and
  • importing them to a known already-existing rom hack called "Pokemon Rocket edition" So, If your wondering. What if
  • Ash was evil? What if ash was working with team rocket? I've thought about creating a rom hack like this I have no idea why
  • Doesn't a rom hack like this exists like this idea is the coolest thing I've ever thought of and I feel like this is a dumb
  • Idea. I don't know why doesn't a such a game exists but I feel like I get the cool ideas here. So, The charater of ash
  • was copied from Pokemon Ash Gray Version, And If you get promoted to an admin on the game you might switch into a grunt
  • Not ash anymore, I tried to change the admin version character and same for the executives, But I never found them Using
  • Overworld Editior rebirth Edition. So, If you know how I can change the admin and Executive character let me know in the
  • comments on my itch.io. So, Heres a fun fact. The other grunts might be ash aswell, So you might not be the only ash, When
  • I was changing the main character somehow it applied to all the other grunts including the player. It was only meant for
  • the player but theres now a million dark ashes here. Thank you for playing the mod. And One day I'll find how to change
  • Your character from an Admin and executive.
